Instructors

Hatef Monajemi

David Donoho

Massive Computational Experiments, Painlessly

Stanford University, Fall 2017

This course covers state-of-the-art practices for doing million-CPU-hour computational experiments on the cloud in a pain-free and reproducible manner. In addition to giving students a hands-on experience with cluster computing, the course features few guest lectures by renowned scientists in the field of Data Science.
